item.description:
Adopt-A-Road - May 17th. 9 a.m. Help us keep clean a small part of South Windsor, West Road off Sullivan Ave. Turn onto West Road from Sullivan Ave and you will see our group meeting on the right hand side. After we are done we go out to breakfast compliments of the chapter.

Please note that you must be a member in good standing (dues paid in full) to have your breakfast paid for by the South Windsor Jaycees. If you are joining that morning-you can partake in the complimentary breakfast. If you are still undecided, you are welcome to join us for breakfast at your cost.
item.how_to_find_us: we will be meeting off to the right as you turn onto West Road
item.name: Road Cleanup
